title: Learning Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Learning Design Workshop for Integrated STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design an integrated approach combining science, engineering, and mathematics to solve real-world scientific problems.
Learners can utilize smartphone-based tools for data collection and analysis in inquiry-based learning stages.
Learners can establish evaluation criteria to assess the effectiveness of STEM-integrated education through team-based project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
